_editor.editorDescription: Create a content page and determine its SEO and social media tags and images.

meta.title: SEO & Social
meta.description:
Tell search engines and social media platforms how they should present your page in search results and posts.

[Watch a video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7CocGvm7RI) | [Learn more about editing meta tags](https://www.sharetribe.com/help/en/articles/8411140-how-to-edit-seo-and-social-metadata-tags)

content.title: Page title
content.description: The page title in search engines and browser tabs. Recommended length: 50–60 characters.

content.title: Page description
content.description: A summary of the page content for search engines. Recommended length: 50-160 characters.

title.title: Page title for social media
title.description: The page title in social media shares and links. Recommended length: 50–60 characters.

description.title: Page description for social media
description.description: A summary of the page content for social media shares and links. Recommended length: 50-160 characters.

image.title: Page image for social media
image.description: The page image in social media shares and links. Recommended aspect ratio: 1.91:1. Recommended minimum size: 1200x630 pixels. Maximum image size: 20MB.

sections.title: Sections
sections.description:
Build a content page out of sections and content blocks. Determine the section layout, color, and appearance. Add titles, descriptions, call-to-action buttons, block text, images, and video.

[Watch a video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZ8YtfZ_5n0&t=124s) | [Learn more about editing content pages](https://www.sharetribe.com/help/en/articles/8387209-how-to-edit-a-content-page)

sectionName.title: Section name
sectionName.description: The section name is only shown in Console. It helps you remember what the section is about.

_errors.pattern: You've added characters that are not allowed.

sectionId.description: Use an anchor link ID to link directly to a section. Example: www.example.com/p/page_id#anchor-link-id. Use lowercase characters, numbers, dashes (-) or underscores (_), and no spaces.
sectionId.title: Anchor link ID

sectionType.description: Determines the section layout. [Learn more about section templates.](https://www.sharetribe.com/help/en/articles/8387253-what-are-section-templates)
sectionType.title: Section template

oneOf.title: Hero
oneOf.description: No content blocks. Consists of a title, description, and button.

oneOf.title: Article
oneOf.description: Content blocks stacked vertically, optimized for reading.

oneOf.title: Carousel
oneOf.description: Content blocks placed horizontally. 1-4 blocks are visible at a time and the rest can be revealed by swiping or scrolling.

oneOf.title: Columns
oneOf.description: Content blocks in a grid of 1, 2, 3, or 4 columns.

oneOf.title: Features
oneOf.description: Content blocks stacked vertically, with text and media side by side in an alternating order.

fieldType.title: Section call to action
fieldType.description: The action you want a user to take after viewing the section.

oneOf.title: Internal link
oneOf.description: A button link to a page in your marketplace.

oneOf.title: External link
oneOf.description: A button link to a page outside your marketplace. Opens in a new tab.

oneOf.title: Custom
oneOf.description: Customize background color, background image, and text color.

backgroundColor.title: Background color
backgroundColor.description: Displayed if the section doesn't have a background image.

backgroundImage.title: Background image
backgroundImage.description: Minimum image dimensions for the best results: 1600x1200px. Maximum image size: 20MB.

preset.title: Background image overlay
preset.description: You can make the image darker to make the text easier to read.

blockName.title: Block name
blockName.description: The block name is only shown in Console. It helps you remember what the block is about.

_errors.pattern: You've added characters that are not allowed.

blockId.description: Use an anchor link ID to link directly to a block. Example: www.example.com/p/page_id#anchor-link-id. Use lowercase characters, numbers, dashes (-) or underscores (_), and no spaces.
blockId.title: Anchor link ID

blockType.title: Block type
blockType.$comment: Currently, we only have one block type but in the future there could be many

image.title: Image file
image.description: Sharetribe supports most common image formats. Maximum image size: 20MB.

alt.description: A short description of the image for accessibility and search engines.
alt.title: Image alt text

oneOf.title: Internal link
oneOf.description: A link to a page in your marketplace.

oneOf.title: External link
oneOf.description: A link to a page outside your marketplace. Opens in a new tab.

_errors.pattern: YouTube video ID must contain only letters and numbers and _ or - characters.

youtubeVideoId.description: The part of a YouTube link after "watch?v=". For example, for the video youtube.com/watch?v=UffchBUUIoI, the ID is UffchBUUIoI.
youtubeVideoId.title: YouTube video ID

content.title: Block text
content.description: You can format text with markdown. [Learn more about markdown.](https://www.sharetribe.com/help/en/articles/8404687-how-to-format-your-text-in-pages-with-markdown)

fieldType.title: Block call to action
fieldType.description: The action you want a user to take after viewing the block.
